title: CADONO Leather Desk Pad Protector, Non-Slip PU Leather Large Mouse Pad, Easy Clean Desk Protector Mat, Writing Pad for Office/Home/Decor (Grayish Lavender, 23.6" x 13.7")
description: Introducing our durable PU leather desk protector, meticulously crafted to withstand scratches, stains, spills, heat, and scuffs, ensuring long-lasting use. This multifunctional desk pad also doubles as a large mouse pad, offering a comfortable surface for your hands whether you're at the office or home. The special non-slip design eliminates the need for an extra mouse pad, maintaining a neat and professional look. With a unique suede back for increased friction resistance, this pad is designed for single-side use. Easy to clean and waterproof, it effortlessly handles liquid, dust, grease, and dirt. Plus, our tasteful synthetic leather adds elegance without any unpleasant smell, reflecting our commitment to delivering high-quality products and exceptional service. If you're not satisfied, we offer the option of a replacement or a full refund, making it a great choice for your workspace or as a thoughtful gift.
